Name: VR Run
About the game: VR Run A Run In Place VR Game Run into a virtual world just by running in place. Two game modes Free run: Where you can run wherever you want. Follow mode: You have to follow your partner. You can track the distance and time. The first release contains a night city environment. We are planning new environments to be added. We are working on new amazing features, so be aware of the future updates. You can play VR Run on an Oculus VR headset. We will be working on compatibility for more VR headsets.
Meta Title: VR Run: Nov 5, 2022, Elvio Lujan and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on VR Run? Check out the release date (Nov 5, 2022), developer insights from Elvio Lujan, and a complete game summary.
